overview:
Prior to joining Aster Capital in 2010, Cédric has been active in Venture Capital for the past 10 years working for Mangrove (Luxembourg), Mileno Capital (Spain) and FCJE (France)and at the EIF, Europe’s leading fund of funds. Cédric joined BIP (Luxembourg) where he was responsible for investing in early and later stage technology funds and made 8 co-investments with them as well as 2 direct investments. He subsequently joined DFJ Esprit (UK) as an Investment Manager where he led the fundraising efforts and deal flow sourcing activities in Cleantech and tech related companies in Europe. He also co-founded or has been closely involved with three Cleantech companies.

Cédric has 3 master degrees including 2 from Sciences Po Paris in Finance and European politics and is fluent in Spanish and English.

Cédric is a Board observer at OST (Oxford).
